title: Top in Control of Corruption
description: In 2023, Denmark achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Control of Corruption: Percentile Rank, indicating it is perceived as the least corrupt country globally.

title: Leading in Renewable Energy Production
description: In 2021, 78.91% of Denmark's electricity was produced from renewable sources, excluding hydroelectric, showcasing its commitment to sustainable energy.

title: Universal Financial Inclusion
description: By 2021, 100% of Denmark's population aged 15 and above had an account at a financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider, reflecting complete financial inclusion.

title: Negative Growth in Domestic Claims
description: In 2023, Denmark experienced a -16.24% growth in claims on other sectors of the domestic economy, indicating a significant contraction.
